testresult.testspecname: VERIFY ORDER: With List Price and MAP Price.

step.description: If able to find the cookies
Define if to add a Serviceplan
Define if to continue place order
Enter Account and Password in My Account Page
Click Saved Cart in Cart to temporary login in cart
Click the Login in the New Form
If able to find the cookies
If able to find the cookies
Enter a keyword in the Search Field and Go
Store the Search url parameter when keyword is search
CRF 47961 - REDESIGN ADD TO CART BUTTON IN SEARCH
Verify the page is still in Search Results.
Click Image or description to go to PDP.
Store the Final Price if available
verify the Final Price of PDP Redesign
If the Final Price is free after rebates set strikethrough price as final price
verify the Final Price of PDP Redesign
Store the Strikethrough Price if available
verify the Strikethrough Price of PDP Redesign
Store the Strikethrough Price of PDP Redesign
If to add a Service Plan, add a Service Plan
If to add a Service Plan
if not to add service plan, click add to cart
If Buy Customize button - skip the mac config page
PDP: Click Add to Cart button
Page proceeds to Configurator Page/Engraving/Service Plan
Click the Configurator Page - Add to Cart Button
Click Engraving - Buy Now without engraving button
Click Next in Service Plan selection
if not to add service plan, click add to cart
If Buy Customize button - skip the mac config page
PDP: Click Add to Cart button
Page proceeds to Configurator Page/Engraving/Service Plan
Click the Configurator Page - Add to Cart Button
Click Engraving - Buy Now without engraving button
Click Next in Service Plan selection
Retry to wait if the page is still in PDP
Page is no longer on PDP
Page is no longer on PDP
Verify Recommended page msc-194 is skipped

parameter.name: text
parameter.value: Your shopping cart is currently empty!

step.description: If able to find the cookies
Verify first if the XPath of Final Price exist
Verify Instant and Mail in Rebate
PDP Final Price is not negative
Verify the Unit Price is not Negative
Verify the Unit Price is not 0.00
Verify the Unit Price in PDP is the prince in the cart
Verify Instant and Mail in Rebate
Verify the Unit Price is not negative
Verify the Unit Price is not 0.00
Verify the Unit Price in PDP can be found in the cart
Click Checkout in Unified Shopping Cart
Verify Instant and Mail in Rebate
Verify the Sub Total in the Order Review is NOT same with the Cart
Verify the Grand Total is not 0
Verify Order: Sub Total is not negative
Verify the Sub Total is not negative
Verify Instant and Mail in Rebate
Verify the Sub Total in the Order Review is same with the Cart
Verify the Sub Total in the Order Review is not the List Price.
Verify the Grand Total is not 0
Verify Order: Sub Total is not negative
Verify the Sub Total is not negative
